title: The Chosen of Shar
content:
scribed how there was once an entire army of Dark Justiciars that waged war against followers of Selûne, long ago. The rites of becoming a Dark Justiciar are no mean feat - they must have had a substantial lair in order to train and anoint a force of such size.

After you saved Druid Halsin and killed all the goblin leaders, Halsin will suggest you travel to Moonrise Towers through the Underdark. He also mentions there's a group of Shar's Chosen in Underdark, which interests Shadowheart and upda
